page.title: 07HOUSES ON THE ESTATE 2
page.content: The houses have coal fires and inset windows, of which there are 3 different types in the main room. The cottage is rather small and has only 3 main rooms, a bathroom and a kitchen. At the kitchen door there is a porch which looks onto the garden. The rooms in the cottage are quite small and the biggest was the 2nd bedroom. There are 2 halls in the cottage; one at the entrance and another leading to the bathroom. The house and the garden cover at least one acre. The house that was built on to the stables was one of 3 and is quite high and narrow. It has 3 bedrooms, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom and a sitting room. This house is estimated to be worth Â£20,000.
